topic.title: Molecular diffusion and mechanical dispersion

body.p: Molecular diffusion and mechanical dispersion have now been added for the water phase. In the INTERSECT 2021.4 release, these were only implemented for the oil and gas phases. You can use the MassTransferModel node to model mass transfer by molecular diffusion and mechanical dispersion for thermal and compositional models with component solubility in water. Among other workflows, this feature helps to model key CO2 storage features.
For more information, refer to the Diffusion chapter in the INTERSECT Technical Description and the Diffusion workflow example in the INTERSECT User Guide.
